NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Twitter and Growth or the cell corresponding to Spotify and Revenue?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Twitter} and {Growth} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Online News and Algorithms or the cell corresponding to TikTok and Users?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Blogs and Algorithms or the cell corresponding to Blogs and Creator Economy?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Blogs} and {Algorithms} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.03 to 0.17?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Twitter, Algorithms), (Blogs, Creator Economy), (Gaming Platforms, Creator Economy), (Blogs, Data Privacy), (Facebook, Growth), (Podcasts, Growth), (Facebook, Platform Trends), (Spotify, Platform Trends), (Blogs, Users)}.
